thumb.title: 【作業用BGM/フリーBGM/Free Music】Fantasy Mercury vol.63
thumb.description: 音楽を作っています。音源についてはクレジットの表記をしていただければ自由に使っていただいて構いません。******* Miyashi's info *******audiostock : https://audiostock.jp/artists/61463 booth : https://miyashi.booth.pm/ ***************************** Thank you for stopping by Miyashi Music Studio. I created a music smells like a fantasy world , RPG town or RPG medieval or ...something. It makes you want to go adventure. please subscribe if you like my works. all my work is available free, provided you credit me and indicate copyright. Thank you. All composed by Miyashi.
